text: Agha Bozorg Mosque (Persian: مسجد آقا بزرگ, Masjed-e Āghā Bozorg) is a historic mosque in the city of Kashan, Iran. It was built at the end of the 18th century by a builder named Ustad Haj Sa'ban-ali. The mosque and its religious school (madrasa) are in the center of the city. == Gallery == File:A View of Front door.jpg|link=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:A_View_of_Front_door.jpg|A view of the front door File:Mezquita de Agha Bozorg, Kashan, Irán, 2016-09-19, DD 84.jpg|link=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Mezquita_de_Agha_Bozorg,_Kashan,_Ir%C3%A1n,_2016-09-19,_DD_84.jpg|A view of the courtyard File:Mezquita de Agha Bozorg, Kashan, Irán, 2016-09-19, DD 82.jpg|link=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Mezquita_de_Agha_Bozorg,_Kashan,_Ir%C3%A1n,_2016-09-19,_DD_82.jpg|The symmetry in design is a trademark of Islamic architects File:Mezquita de Agha Bozorg, Kashan, Irán, 2016-09-19, DD 80.jpg|link=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Mezquita_de_Agha_Bozorg,_Kashan,_Ir%C3%A1n,_2016-09-19,_DD_80.jpg|Main mosque building File:Mezquita de Agha Bozorg, Kashan, Irán, 2016-09-19, DD 83.jpg|link=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Mezquita_de_Agha_Bozorg,_Kashan,_Ir%C3%A1n,_2016-09-19,_DD_83.jpg|Detail of an iwan File:Mezquita de Agha Bozorg, Kashan, Irán, 2016-09-19, DD 85.jpg|link=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Mezquita_de_Agha_Bozorg,_Kashan,_Ir%C3%A1n,_2016-09-19,_DD_85.jpg|Ceiling File:Agha Bozorg mosque, Kashan.jpg|link=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Agha_Bozorg_mosque,_Kashan.jpg|The mosque at sunset File:Agha Bozorg Mosque, Kashan, Iran.jpg|An inside view == References == Category:Religious buildings and structures in Iran
title: Agha Bozorg Mosque
